00044 #ifndef _CSL_PLLAUX_H_

00103 static inline
00104 Bool PLL_getTestLockMonStatus(PLL_Handle hPll)
00105 {
00106     Uint16 TstLckMon = 0;
00107 #if (!(defined(CHIP_C5517)))
00108     TstLckMon = ((hPll->sysAddr->CGCR3 & (0x0008u)) >> (0x0003u));
00109 #endif
00110     if( TstLckMon )
00111         return TRUE;
00112     return FALSE;
00113 }
00114 
00165 static inline
00166 CSL_Status PLL_getConfig(PLL_Handle hPll,PLL_Config *pConfig)
00167 {
00168     CSL_Status status = CSL_SOK;
00169 
00170     if(NULL == hPll)
00171     {
00172         status = CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE;
00173         return status;
00174     }
00175 
00176     if(NULL == pConfig)
00177     {
00178         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00179         return status;
00180     }
00181 #if (!(defined(CHIP_C5517)))
00182     pConfig->PLLCNTL1   = hPll->sysAddr->CGCR1;
00183     pConfig->PLLCNTL2   = hPll->sysAddr->CGCR3;
00184     pConfig->PLLINCNTL  = hPll->sysAddr->CGCR2;
00185     pConfig->PLLOUTCNTL = hPll->sysAddr->CGCR4;
00186 #else
00187     pConfig->PLLMR  = hPll->sysAddr->PMR;
00188     pConfig->PLLICR = hPll->sysAddr->PICR;
00189     pConfig->PLLCR  = hPll->sysAddr->PCR;
00190     pConfig->PLLODR = hPll->sysAddr->PODCR;
00191 #endif
00192     return status;
00193 }
00194 
00195 #ifdef __cplusplus
00196 }
00197 #endif
00198 
00201 #endif// _CSL_PLLAUX_H_
